content.text:
# Edward Roberts (South African cricketer)

Edward Roberts (born 1 July 1903, date of death unknown) was a South African cricketer who appeared in nine first-class matches for Orange Free State in the 1920s.
References
*[http://cricketarchive.co.uk/Archive/Players/25/25910/25910.html Edward Roberts] from CricketArchive
*[http://www.cricinfo.com/ci/content/player/47123.html Edward Robert's profile at CricInfo.com]
